TopicTitle: [0.22] B9 Aerospace Pack / R4.0c / New pods, IVAs, engines, fuselages & structures

Articles.Content:

where are those rectangular engines i see people using? cant find them

On the computers of Bac9 and Taverius

Oh, my bad then

The first thing I'm gonna do is get some kerbals, rename them Maverick and Goose, load it up with missiles and then spend the rest of the day making Top Gun references.

That was my idea with the last 2 pictures of the album

The Concorde called, it wants it's intakes back

Our ramp intakes were indeed inspired by the Concorde and other similar intake designs.

Edited May 13, 2013 by Taverius
They look great, are they going to have animated internal bits?

Geez Tav, I go unconscious for a few hours, and you have the nerve to release awesome teasers. Seriously some people...

So...if that's based off the Concorde...Does that mean we can operate it for 27 years without catastrophic failure until we start charging $20,000 per ticket and overload the fuselage towards aft, and forget to clear the runway?

Never got to be on one of those things but they're so pretty...

Edited May 13, 2013 by shadowsutekh
new screen shot looks like an f-22 raptor with a touch of concorde
to bad you guys dont make landing gear cause they would be sweet

They look great, are they going to have animated internal bits?

The ramp moves, yes. We have a plugin coming that will open/close it with airspeed like its supposed to.

to bad you guys dont make landing gear cause they would be sweet

Landing gear might come, but its a lot of work to make an animate one. Not this update, anyway; like bac9 said before, this round we've mainly focused on engines and intakes.

awesome! looking forward to 2.6

will 2.7 then maybe feature IVA for the hypersonic cockpit?

And is it maybe possible to adjust the VTOL engines in such a way so we can stick 'em anywhere, not just on the green attachment nodes?
maybe a noob question, but how do i get something inside the cargo bay? i cant seem to build in there.

Brilliant modders who are making the B9 parts- PLEASE STOP TAUNTING US WITH BEAUTIFUL IMAGES OF THINGS WE WANT TO PLAY WITH!

Seriously though, these look sweet.

I want to play with them. Please let us play....
We're waiting on the plugins and I have to finish one more engine for this release to happen. Can't really give an estimate though, plugins are out of my control.
Ok... Sorry. I hope that this is soon.... Because these look gorgeous.
can someone explain how i can build a sattelite and place it in the cargo hold?
Can someone explain how i can build something in the cargo hold?
Place a docking port on something, build or load payload and stick to docking port, then move docking port to surface attach to the cargo bay wall. At least that is how I do it.
cool to hear its all coming together love this mod its so awesome

Place a docking port on something, build or load payload and stick to docking port, then move docking port to surface attach to the cargo bay wall. At least that is how I do it.

i tried a radial attachment point, that did the trick for me.

Can someone explain how i can build something in the cargo hold?

If Read's method of using a docking port doesn't work I sometimes simply take part of my ship apart, add the payload and re-assemble.
Congrats on making the dev team Bac9!
Yea, grats Bac!

Congrats on making the dev team Bac9!

Woah when did that happen? I clearly missed an announcement! Nicely done! Congrats! I think we all held suspicions of that happening, and hopefully it means your current parts, or similar ones become stock.

Selfish moment: Does this mean the future of B9 is uncertain? Or will you continue to develop it standalone in whatever spare time you have and decide to devote to it?
